Description:
CleaningCompany.ae is looking for a full stack web developer,The required person should have initiative, and get-it-done mentality.Main Duties include:WordPress Management - managing the website back-end including database and server integration
Knowledge in PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to ensure the site is accessible and easy to follow and for increased interaction with visitors
Monitoring and managing the payment gateway and ERP integration
Monitoring the performance and Troubleshooting content issues.Skills
Skills: The idle applicant should have good experience also in SEO techniques:

Able to rank the keywords in the search engines and improve the positions
Creating SEO Plan and executing it
Monitor performance and make a report of ranking positions and work done for the keywords
Write original content for webpages - tailored for the target audience
Employ user experience (UX) and conversion rate optimization methods to turn visitors into more active users and to help improve website performance
Finding the relevant and high-quality link-building opportunities
